description: This file contains a Python test class 'GccTests' that verifies the configuration and location of the gcc compiler within a specific SDK environment. It uses the oeqa testing framework to run commands and assert conditions related to gcc's installation paths and specifications.

classes.name: GccTests
classes.description: A test class inheriting from OESDKTestCase to verify the correct setup of gcc in the SDK environment.

methods.name: test_verify_specs(self)
methods.description: Test method that verifies gcc's installation path and specifications, ensuring it was relocated properly and isn't using hard-coded paths.
